summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3387, for the improvement of Hiawatha Place from Charles Street to Dearborn Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42019 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
